#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType HolePlacementWithDistances.

== Name ==

*[CHolePlacementWithDistances HolePlacementWithDistances]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--HolePlacementWithDistances (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Description of the placement on the hole on the surface of the green in a precise,
				tournament fashion, which includes length and width of the green and distance of
				the hole from 2 edges of the green.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  number = [SOneToEighteen OneToEighteen]>  ([CLengthWithUnits green-length], [CLengthWithUnits green-width], [CHoleDistanceOnGreen hole-distance]{2,2}  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CLengthWithUnits golfml:LengthWithUnits] || [CLengthWithUnits green-length] ||  					Length of green.				 ||
|| [CLengthWithUnits golfml:LengthWithUnits] || [CLengthWithUnits green-width] ||  					Width of green.				 ||
|| [CHoleDistanceOnGreen golfml:HoleDistanceOnGreen] || [CHoleDistanceOnGreen hole-distance] ||  					Distance of hole from edge of green.				 ||      

=== Attributes ===

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
        
|| number ||   || [SOneToEighteen golfml:OneToEighteen] || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CHolePlacement HolePlacement]
----
    <xs:complexType name="HolePlacementWithDistances">  <xs:sequence>    <xs:element name="green-length" type="golfml:LengthWithUnits">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="green-width" type="golfml:LengthWithUnits">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="2" minOccurs="2" name="hole-distance" type="golfml:HoleDistanceOnGreen">    </xs:element>  </xs:sequence>  <xs:attribute name="number" type="golfml:OneToEighteen"/></xs:complexType>
----
